title: Calories in a Slice of Pepperoni Pizza
meta_description: Discover calories in pizza slice pepperoni, including full nutrition breakdown per slice, macros, and tips for variations like thin crust.
h1: Calories in a Slice of Pepperoni Pizza
assumptions: Standard 14-inch pizza, one slice (1/8 of whole), hand-tossed crust, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, tomato sauce; no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, crust type, cheese amount, and baking method. Check labels or restaurant info when available.

quick_answer.text: One slice of pepperoni pizza has about 285 kcal, with 12 g protein and 10 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add extra cheese (1 oz per slice)

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Approximately 285 kcal for a standard slice.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a pepperoni pizza slice?
faqs.a: About 36 g carbs, including 2 g fiber and 4 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is pepperoni pizza high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, one slice has around 640 mg sodium from cheese, sauce, and meat.

faqs.q: How does crust type affect calories in pizza slice pepperoni?
faqs.a: Thin crust reduces calories by ~40 kcal per slice; deep-dish adds ~50 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a slice of pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Roughly 12 g protein, mainly from cheese and pepperoni.
